title: Requires public service commission to post on its website any utility's rates and charges in the last 12 months
summary: Requires public service commission to post on its website any utility's rates and charges in the last 12 months.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         2703

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 20, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by M. of A. RABBITT -- read once and referred to the Commit-
         tee on Energy

       AN ACT to amend the public service law, in  relation  to  requiring  the
         public service commission to post and maintain on its internet website
         any utility's reported rates and charges in the previous twelve months

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. Paragraph (a) of subdivision 12 of section 66 of the public
    2  service law, as amended by chapter 154 of the laws of 1989,  is  amended
    3  to read as follows:
    4    (a)  Have power to require every gas corporation, electric corporation
    5  [and], municipality, OR ENERGY SERVICE COMPANY OR  SUPPLIER  hereinafter
    6  in  this subdivision called a utility to file with the commission and to
    7  print and keep open to public inspection schedules showing all rates and
    8  charges made, established or enforced or to be charged or enforced,  all
    9  forms of contract or agreement and all rules and regulations relating to
   10  rates, charges or service used or to be used, and all general privileges
   11  and  facilities  granted  or  allowed  by  such utility[; but this]. THE
   12  COMMISSION SHALL PUBLISH AND MAINTAIN ON ITS INTERNET WEBSITE ANY UTILI-
   13  TY'S REPORTED RATES AND CHARGES MADE, ESTABLISHED  OR  ENFORCED  IN  THE
   14  PREVIOUS  TWELVE  MONTHS.  THIS  subdivision  shall  not apply to state,
   15  municipal or federal contracts, except  to  the  extent  such  contracts
   16  relate to transportation of electricity.
   17    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately.



        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD03890-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to requiring the public service commission to post and maintain on its internet website any utility's reported rates and charges in the previous twelve months
